name: Critical Mass (itch) (Molly the Brolly)
description:
Resource management game in the style of your average everyday Catholic mass (purchase expansion packs for other religions, only nine ninety-nine, ninety-nine). Not everyone is going to be thrilled by how you conduct your sermon. Keep as many of your congregation happy as you can and bask in that sweet heavenly glow of the collection plate moola. Only then can you reach CRITICAL MASS!!!

Gameplay Footage
